verbs.description: [ARG1: A Qatari investor] [V: referenced] [ARGM-LOC: in a series of tweets from Michael Avenatti] [ARGM-TMP: this week] confirmed to CNN through a spokesperson on Tuesday that he did attend meetings at Trump Tower in December 2016 . The stated reason : Ahmed Al - Rumaihi wanted face time with Trump transition officials . " Mr.
